CustomAttribute.Name: Discipline
CustomAttribute.Description: The custom 'Discipline' attribute [Felles | Skilt | Overbygning | Underbygning | Kontaktledning | Signal | Tele | Lavspent] identifies the discpline owning the object.

CustomAttribute.Name: MileageIncreasesTowardsLeft
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'MileageIncreasesTowardsLeft' property [boolean] true if and only if the object's own alignment has mileage which increases towards the left in the drawing, with the UCS Y-axis pointing upwards. Usage: Used in DNA for orienting 2D symbols correctly of for adjusting left/right parts of texts etc.

CustomAttribute.Name: AngularOffset
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'AngularOffset' custom property [DD] is added to the object's basic 3D orientation. The basic orientation is defined by the current 'dir' property's up/down/none/both/unknown value. If property dir is 'unknown' then the orientation will be 45 degrees as a visual reminder that dir is unknown. For some objects types (e.g. yokes) the 2D symbol orientation will also be affected.

CustomAttribute.Name: Tag
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'Tag' custom property holds a unique identifier, within an administration's context, such as a unique key for the administration's asset management database. Hide/unhide using the ShowLayer tool.

CustomAttribute.Name: ObjectInfo
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'ObjectInfo' custom property holds user-defined information which needs to be shown in drawings. Hide/unhide using the ShowLayer tool. Extra information, e.g. for the building process, should be stored in the Description property.

CustomAttribute.Name: Var0
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'Var0' custom property [String] is a local variable for free use.

CustomAttribute.Name: Var1
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'Var1' custom property [String] is a local variable for free use.

CustomAttribute.Name: Var2
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'Var2' custom property [String] is a local variable for free use.

CustomAttribute.Name: Var3
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'Var3' custom property [String] is a local variable for free use.

CustomAttribute.Name: Var4
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'Var4' custom property [String] is a local variable for free use.

CustomAttribute.Name: Var5
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'Var5' custom property [String] is a local variable for free use.

CustomAttribute.Name: Var6
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'Var6' custom property [String] is a local variable for free use.

CustomAttribute.Name: Var7
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'Var7' custom property [String] is a local variable for free use.

CustomAttribute.Name: Var8
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'Var8' custom property [String] is a local variable for free use.

CustomAttribute.Name: Var9
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'Var9' custom property [String] is a local variable for free use.

CustomAttribute.Name: Yokemounted
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'Yokemounted' boolean custom property defines whether the object (board, signal etc) has its own mast (default:false) or is suspended from a yoke (true).

CustomAttribute.Name: SpreadingLens
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SpreadingLens' custom property [Ja,-] defines whether the signal shall use spreading lenses (default: '-').

TextPositionLuaExpression.Name: OBJEKTNAVN
TextPositionLuaExpression.Formula: RC__acsVector2wcsVector(RightSided and 3.0 or -3.0, dir == 'up' and 0.5 or -0.5)

LuaExpression.Name: DistanceToAlignment
LuaExpression.Formula: --[[ sc = DocumentData.Document.Database.Cannoscale.Scale --Annotative scale if RcType:upper():match("SEGMENT") then d = getPropertyValue("DistanceToAlignment") if d == 0 then return -6/sc else return RC__snap(d*sc,3)/sc end else return RightSided and 4e-4 or -4e-4 end --]] d = getPropertyValue("DistanceToAlignment") sc = DocumentData.Document.Database.Cannoscale.Scale --Annotative scale if d == 0 then return -6/sc else return RC__snap(d*sc,3)/sc end

LuaExpression.Name: RelativeElevation
LuaExpression.Formula: if Yokemounted then --Object has the Yokemounted custom attribute: return Yokemounted and 8.0 or 0 else if Variant:find("Baliseskilt") then return 0.30 --Typically located on platform side facing the track elseif Variant:find("75B") then return 2.75 --On tunnel wall elseif Variant:find("Rømningsavstand") then return 1.85 --Escape distance/directions. On tunnel wall. else return 0 end end

LuaExpression.Name: RelativeElevation
LuaExpression.Formula: if Yokemounted == nil then return 0 else return Yokemounted and 8.0 or 0 end
